basics.name: Julius Lagazo
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026. I plan on reconnecting with my roots and returning back home to give back to the community that raised me by sharing my own academic experiences.

education.area: Electical & Computer Engineering: CENG Track (expected Spring, 2026)

awards.title: Career and Technical Education (CTE) Certification
awards.summary: An educational program that aligns academic standards with technical knowledge and skills to prepare students for careers in current or emerging occupations and further education; completed with a final Performance Based Assessment (PBA) project.
